.class public auto ansi sealed CompositeActivator extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function CompositeActivator(context As LifetimeContext, operation As CompositionOperation) As Object
public delegate System::Object ^ CompositeActivator(LifetimeContext ^ context, CompositionOperation ^ operation);
type CompositeActivator = delegate of LifetimeContext * CompositionOperation -> obj

param.name: context
param.span: Контекст, в котором осуществляется доступ к части или экспорту.

span.span: The context in which the part or export is being accessed.

param.name: operation
param.span: Операция, в рамках которой происходит активация.

span.span: The operation within which the activation is occurring.

summary.span: Делегат, позволяющий осуществлять доступ к экземплярам частей и экспортам во время композиции.

span.span: The delegate that allows instances of parts and exports to be accessed during composition.
